article_title: Congress Cuts Its Funding To Lowest Level Since 1998

article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway

og.description: The massive 2015 spending bill that President Obama is likely to sign this week continues an ongoing effort to trash the Internal Revenue Service.  It is a cynical recipe for a self-fulfilling disaster: Give the agency more and more work. Cut its budget. Blame it for failing to do its [...]
